name: Universal Icons
author: Rahul Taiwala

sections.description:
Please drop me a message, if there is any problem in using the plugin.

This plugin allows you to set Open Source Icons(Currently includes Font Awesome Icons) before or after widget title.

Premium Universal Icons

Premium Features

  • The plugin lets you insert Icons easily Before and After Widgets Title.
  • It also provides Visual Editor Button to easily insert Icons in your content.
  • Latest Font Awesome Icons
  • Foundation Font Icons
  • Currently it has 900+ Icons to choose from
  • Font Awesome Icons are auto updated every 7 Days
  • More Font Icons to be included in future updates

Universal Icons in Visual Editor Provides these features

  • Icon Selection
  • Set Icon as Hyperlink
  • Set Icon Size
  • Set Icon Color
  • Custom CSS Class

Universal Icons in Widgets provide these features

  • Icon Selection
  • Set Icon Before or After widget title
  • Set Icon Size
  • Custom CSS Class

Usuage

There is no special step to use it. After activating the plugin you will get the options to select the icon in the Widget Screen.
sections.installation:
How to install?

  1. Upload ts-icons-universal-free to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

Or
Install it via WordPress Plugins menu.

  1. Add New Plugin
  2. Search Universal Icons
sections.faq: Initial Version yet to get some questions
